text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Creek, ova here!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Okay～ Just give me one moment… I need to put my bag into the locker… Ah, everything is spilling out…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Why're you bringin' so much stuff…? Well whatever, I'll go on ahead! We'll meet up later!

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Brai… Brains… Braaiins…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Woah, the hell's this?! These zombies look like the real deal… If I were to 've brought kids here, they'd be sure to cry their eyes out…

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Braaaiinnss!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Kyaaaa!?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Hmm!? That scream just now…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: No… Rice-san's scream would have been much fainter. Therefore, I must continue my search.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Kyaaa!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Hmm!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice-san!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-Bourbon-san!? Kyaa!?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ouch…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Tamamo-san!?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: S-Sorry bout tha… Huh, Rice!? Wait, Bourbon's here too!? Great, I've got somethin' to say to…
(Pling…)
(Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Wh-What…? What on Earth's goin' on with this thing…!?
Heh… Hehehe… I found you…

text_block_list.name: The Group
text_block_list.text: Kyaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I've finally caught you♪ So don't run away from me anymore.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Wait, Cree — What the hell're you wearin'!?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I wanted to use this as an opportunity to check the mobility of our costumes. Of course, I brought yours as well♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: If you'd like to change into your costume just let me know. I'll be sure to give you a whole buunch of support…♪

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: S-Something seems off about Creek-san today…?

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Braaaiinss…!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Uwaaah!? That thing's here too!?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Araara, what a troublesome child… Come here…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh, your arm seems all beat up. I'll fix it up right away.

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Br… aai… Ma…?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, stay still for a little bit. Now we can be together from here on.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: And I'll be your mama…♪ Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Mummy (former zombie)
text_block_list.text: Ma… Mamaa… Mamaa…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I'll try my best to be a great mama for everyone today…♪ Hehe… Who's a good boy♪

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Sh-She… made the enemy into her baby…! With no questions asked, she turned her enemy into her baby…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: That outfit seems to have powered her up. It's like… a racing outfit….?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: So this is the power of costumes…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The power of costumes?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: It seems as though even if one originally wore a costume for the purposes of becoming a monster, that same costume could be used for the purposes of having fun as well.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Experiencing one's suppressed desires… Becoming someone different from oneself… I think that is the true purpose of Halloween, to achieve these desires through a transformation.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: That is quite interesting.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah… Well that wasn't an actual quote, it's just how I felt while reading that book…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I have sorted through the collected information regarding mission "Joint dormitory Halloween party" and determined that the lacking information is located here somewhere.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Therefore, a new task has been initiated. “Circumnavigate the amusement park.”

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Bourbon, wait up! Let me help you! Plus I've got somethin' to tell you!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe… Then I'll go too. Allow me to help the two of you♪
